title: Alluring Tales: Hot Holiday Nights
description: The holidays are heating up—with seven wickedly sensual stories guaranteed to spice up those chilly winter nights!“Peaches and Cream” by Cathryn FoxA psychology student goes online hoping to live out her steamiest fantasy—and ends up on a hot mystery date with a wickedly imaginative stud who brings out her inner pole-dancer. . .“Indecent Exposure” by Delilah DevlinA determined lady comes home, burning for her girlhood crush—a sexy lawman who totes a big gun. . .“Billboard Babe” by Myla JacksonA creative ad man's passion is aroused when he sees his buttoned-up coworker in a revealing new light—dressed in sizzling red satin on a giant billboard. . .“Wish upon a Star” by Sasha WhiteA professional dominatrix wishes upon a star, and her fantasy appears—an insatiable alpha male in biker boots who's literally out of this world. . .“That Old Black Magic” by Sylvia DayA tall, dark, handsome warlock finds himself obsessed with his "familiar"—a sleek and sexy cat-woman who turns out to be the purr-fect lover. . .“Forbidden Fruit” by Lisa Renee JonesShe was always hot for big brother's best friend—and now her erotic dream is here in the taut and tempting flesh. . .“Silver Waters” by Vivi AnnaA pair of fugitive lovers finds themselves warm and toasty in a sultry Caribbean paradise—and ready for some red-hot fun in the sun. . .
author: Vivi Anna
